Jason Lind, Punch and co arn't in the brig. They left there a long time ago.

About the character page, the comp I have in Boston is very old, and can't 
support the Tripod filemanager, so I am unable to update unless I'm at 
someone else's house. I'll try to get it updated as soon as possible, but I 
don't know when.

::Perndabot::

Perndabot's eyes widen. This was one experienced pred if she thought she 
could actually do it.

"Allright..." he says doubtfully, jerking his eyes back up to her face, "But 
don't say I didn't warn you."

He takes a step forward, looking at Gangon's spark. "Is he coming too?"
